tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IoT_Data (
    device_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_data JSONB,
    external_system_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE IoTDevices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ExternalSystems (
  system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(255),
  system_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE DataExchange (
  exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  system_id INT,
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  exchange_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE IoTDevices ( 
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_name VARCHAR(50), 
    device_type VARCHAR(50), 
    location VARCHAR(50), 
    status BOOLEAN 
);

CREATE TABLE ExternalSystems ( 
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    system_name VARCHAR(50), 
    system_type VARCHAR(50), 
    connection_type VARCHAR(50), 
    status BOOLEAN 
);

CREATE TABLE DataExchangeLogs ( 
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_id INT, 
    system_id INT, 
    exchange_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    exchange_data JSONB 
);

CREATE TABLE IoTDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    location_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_device FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DataExchange (
    exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    system_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_format VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_device FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_system FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES ExternalSystems(system_id)
);
